ygData.subject: Re: Highpass Hold...KS LAND?
ygData.msgSnippet: Absolutely true! KS and ffa looting. I must say it s gotten a lot worse in the last few days. Maybe (hopefully) it s just a bad spell, and will return to
ygData.messageBody:
Absolutely true! KS and ffa looting. I must say
it's gotten a lot worse in the last few days. Maybe
(hopefully) it's just a bad spell, and will return to normal
soon. The last few times I went Orc side were very
unproductive due to KS competeing groups. The only civil place
in the zone is the Aggro npc camp just across from
the Keep. Spawn is slow, but usually no one is there.
Loot is bronze and coin, and two high teens can hold
it indefinitely. Watch out for the Dwarf. He
backstabs for 78 points.<br><br> Foleen
